flawed_nl_solution:
Jake has to descend 30 steps on 9 floors for a total of 9*30 = <<30*9=720>>720 steps
He descends 3 steps every second so he will descend 720 steps in 720/3 = <<720/3=240>>240 seconds.
Austin will get down after only a minute (60 seconds) so Jake will get down 240-60 = <<240-60=180>>180 seconds later.
#### 180

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 270, not 720. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
